snippet.title: Legends Of Tomorrow Adds Gorilla Grodd, Reconfirms Status As Most Delightful DC/CW Show
snippet.content:
He may have failed in his invasion of Central City, but Gorilla Grodd's next plan of attack is going to be a lot more fun. Everyone's favourite psychic simian has set his sights on Legends of Tomorrow, and we can't wait.
Image: CW
Grodd's involvement in the third season of the show - his first DC/CW appearance outside of The Flash - was confirmed during Legends' panel at the ongoing Television Critics Association press tour:
There are no details where or when Grodd will show up in the season, but considering just how the second season managed to be, I'm dearly hoping that Legends will do the character justice, in the goofiest manner possible. That did have the team infiltrating an old timey circus troupe... maybe they end up finding Grodd there somehow, and monkey business ensues? Sorry (not really).
